properties.displayName: Firewall not sending logs to Sentinel
properties.description:
This rule will detect if any of the Azure or Fortinet firewall is not sending any logs to Sentinel.
DeviceVendor/Resource Field will confirm the Firewall Vendor whether its Azure or Fortinet.

Analyst has to immediately engage the relevant team to check for this log/data ingestion issue to sentinel.
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor in ("Fortinet")
| where Computer !in ('Forticlient-EMS')
| summarize LastReceived = max(TimeGenerated) by DeviceVendor, Computer
| extend TimeofLogs = now() - LastReceived
| where TimeofLogs > 30m

properties.displayName: Suspicious manipulation of firewall detected via Syslog data
properties.description: This query uses syslog data to alert on any suspicious manipulation of firewall to evade defenses. Attackers often perform such operation as seen recently to exploit the remote code execution vulnerability in Log4j component of Apache for C2 communications or exfiltration. For more details on Apache Log4j Remote Code Execution Vulnerability - https://community.riskiq.com/article/505098fc/description Find more details on collecting EXECVE data into Microsoft Sentinel - https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/azure-sentinel/hunting-threats-on-linux-with-azure-sentinel/ba-p/1344431
properties.query:
Syslog
| where Facility == 'user'
| where SyslogMessage has "AUOMS_EXECVE"
| parse SyslogMessage with "type=" EventType " audit(" * "): " EventData
| where EventType =~ "AUOMS_EXECVE"
| parse EventData with * "syscall=" syscall " syscall_r=" * " success=" success " exit=" exit " a0" * " ppid=" ppid " pid=" pid " audit_user=" audit_user " auid=" auid " user=" user " uid=" uid " group=" group " gid=" gid "effective_user=" effective_user " euid=" euid " set_user=" set_user " suid=" suid " filesystem_user=" filesystem_user " fsuid=" fsuid " effective_group=" effective_group " egid=" egid " set_group=" set_group " sgid=" sgid " filesystem_group=" filesystem_group " fsgid=" fsgid " tty=" tty " ses=" ses " comm=\"" comm "\" exe=\"" exe "\"" * "cwd=\"" cwd "\"" * "name=\"" name "\"" * "cmdline=\"" cmdline "\" containerid=" containerid
| where cmdline has_any ("SuSEfirewall2 stop","reSuSEfirewall2 stop","ufw stop","ufw disable")
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, audit_user, user, cmdline
| extend AccountCustomEntity = user, HostCustomEntity = Computer, timestamp = TimeGenerated
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

properties.displayName: UC-CA-1132 - Firewall - Multiple Login Failures From Single Username(Firewall)
properties.description: Firewall - Multiple Login Failures From Single Username(Firewall)

| where DeviceVendor contains "Fortinet"
| where DeviceAction contains "drop" or DeviceAction contains "deny"

properties.displayName: UC-CA-1169 - Firewall - Brute Force Logins from internal host
properties.description: Firewall - Brute Force Logins from internal host
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where (ipv4_is_match("10.0.0.0", SourceIP, 8) or ipv4_is_match("172.16.0.0", SourceIP, 12) or ipv4_is_match("192.168.0.0", SourceIP, 16))
| where (ipv4_is_match("10.0.0.0", DestinationIP, 8) or ipv4_is_match("172.16.0.0", DestinationIP, 12) or ipv4_is_match("192.168.0.0", DestinationIP, 16))
| where DeviceAction contains "Authentication Failures" or DeviceAction contains "Failure"
| summarize dcount(DestinationIP), start_time=min(TimeGenerated), end_time=max(TimeGenerated), count() by SourceIP, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| where count_ > 500

properties.displayName: UC-CC-1143 - Firewall - Possible Mirai Botnet Activity Observed
properties.description: The alert rule was disabled due to too many consecutive failures. Reason: You do not have access permissions to one or more of the resources in the query. This rule identifies activities from MIrai Botnet
properties.query:
(CommonSecurityLog
| where Computer contains "FIREWALL"
| where not(ipv4_is_match("10.0.0.0", SourceIP, 8) or ipv4_is_match("172.16.0.0", SourceIP, 12) or ipv4_is_match("192.168.0.0", SourceIP, 16) or ipv4_is_match("155.227.0.0", SourceIP, 16))
| where (DeviceAction != "deny" or DeviceAction != "drop") and (DestinationPort == 23 or DestinationPort == 2323)
| summarize count() by SourceIP, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| where count_ > 10)
| join kind = innerunique
    (ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
    | where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h) and ExpirationDateTime > now()
    | where Active == true 
    | where Description contains "mirai botnet"
        or Description contains "mirai"
        or * contains " mirai botnet"
        or * contains "mirai"
    | where Description != ""
    //| where FileHashType == ""
    | parse kind =relaxed Url with * "http://" NetworkIP "/" Path
    | where isnotempty(NetworkIP))
    on $left.SourceIP == $right.NetworkIP
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Action,
    IndicatorId,
    NetworkIP,
    SourceIP,
    count_,
    Description,
    Tags,
    ThreatSeverity,
    DomainName
| extend IPCustomEntity = SourceIP

properties.displayName: UC-CC-1433 - Firewall - Outgoing Traffic on Port 447 and 449 (Possible TrickBot Activity)
properties.description: Outgoing Traffic on Port 447 and 449 (Possible TrickBot Activity)
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Fortinet"
| extend action = extract("[A-Za-z:]+[ ]([a-z]+)", 1, Activity)
| where isnotempty(DestinationPort)
| where (ipv4_is_match("10.0.0.0", SourceIP, 8) or ipv4_is_match("172.16.0.0", SourceIP, 12) or ipv4_is_match("192.168.0.0", SourceIP, 16))
| where not(ipv4_is_match("10.0.0.0", DestinationIP, 8) or ipv4_is_match("172.16.0.0", DestinationIP, 12) or ipv4_is_match("192.168.0.0", DestinationIP, 16))
| where SourceIP != '10.244.216.59' //nessusIP - VM Team
| where DestinationPort in (447, 449)

properties.displayName: UC-DI-1238 - firewall - Possible Port Sweep
properties.description: This rule will be helpful to detect possible port sweep, where an attacker try to identify the particular active port across the network.
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DestinationPort <= 1024
| where DeviceAction in ("deny", "accept", "close")
| where not(ipv4_is_in_range(DestinationIP, "10.1.94.0/24")) 
| where not(ipv4_is_in_range(DestinationIP, "10.1.97.0/24")) 
| extend DNSTraffic =iff(SourceIP != "10.244.32.21", "Not DC", iff(DestinationPort == "53", "DC Traffic", "Not a DC Traffic")) //INC2878884
| where DNSTraffic != "DC Traffic"
| summarize
    starttime=min(TimeGenerated),
    endtime=max(TimeGenerated),
    dcount(DestinationIP),
    DestinationIP=make_set(DestinationIP),
    AllowCount=count(DeviceAction == "accept"),
    DenyCount=count(DeviceAction == "deny" or DeviceAction == "close")
    by SourceIP, DestinationPort, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| where dcount_DestinationIP > 200 and AllowCount > 0

properties.displayName: UC-DI-298 - FW - Excessive Firewall Denies from Remote Host
properties.description: FW - Excessive Firewall Denies from Remote Host
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct == "Fortigate" or DeviceProduct == "VPN-1 & FireWall-1"
| parse Activity with "traffic:" SubType " " Action 
| where not(ipv4_is_match("10.0.0.0", SourceIP, 8) or ipv4_is_match("172.16.0.0", SourceIP, 12) or ipv4_is_match("192.168.0.0", SourceIP, 16) or ipv4_is_match("155.227.0.0", SourceIP, 16))
| where (ipv4_is_match("10.0.0.0", DestinationIP, 8) or ipv4_is_match("172.16.0.0", DestinationIP, 12) or ipv4_is_match("192.168.0.0", DestinationIP, 16) or ipv4_is_match("155.227.0.0", SourceIP, 16))
| where DeviceAction in~("deny","Deny","reject","drop") or Action in~("deny","Deny","reject","drop")
| summarize
    start_time=min(TimeGenerated),
    end_time=max(TimeGenerated),
    dcount(DestinationIP),
    destlist= make_set(DestinationIP),
    dcount(DestinationPort),
    destport= make_set(DestinationPort),
    count()
    by SourceIP, DeviceAction, Action,bin(TimeGenerated, 05m),DeviceProduct
| where count_ > 40

properties.displayName: UC-DI-299 - FW - Excessive Firewall Denies from Single Source
properties.description: FW - Excessive Firewall Denies from Single Source
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceAction == "ssl-login-fail" or DeviceAction == "dropped" // Filter for deny actions
| where DestinationPort != 514 // Exclude port 514
| summarize DenyCount = count() by SourceIP, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| where DenyCount > 300
| project SourceIP, DenyCount, TimeGenerated
| sort by DenyCount desc

properties.displayName: UC-DI-378 - Firewall - Host Port Scan Detected by Remote Host
properties.description: Host Port Scan Detected by Remote Host
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Fortinet"
| where DeviceAction !has "deny"
| where not(ipv4_is_private(SourceIP))
| where ipv4_is_private(DestinationIP)
| summarize
    StartTime=min(TimeGenerated),
    EndTime=max(TimeGenerated),
    DesPortList = make_set(DestinationPort),
    EventCount = count()
    by
    SourceIP,
    DestinationIP,
    bin(TimeGenerated, 5m),
    DeviceVendor,
    DeviceProduct,
    DeviceName,
    DeviceAction,
    Protocol,
    Computer
| extend DesPortCount = array_length(DesPortList)
| where EventCount >= 1000 and DesPortCount > 1

properties.displayName: UC-IM-475 - Firewall - Possible Memcache Amplification DDOS
properties.description:
This usecase detects Memcached amplification DDOS attack. A Memcached distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attack is a type of cyber attack in which an attacker attempts to overload a targeted victim with internet traffic. The attacker spoofs requests to a vulnerable UDP Memcached* server, which then floods a targeted victim with internet traffic, potentially overwhelming the victims resources. While the targets internet infrastructure is overloaded, new requests cannot be processed and regular traffic is unable to access the internet resource, resulting in denial-of-service.
 In a Memcached DDoS attack, an attacker sends a request via TCP or UDP to the targeted Memcached servers on port 11211 and spoofs the IP address of the victim where the sent request consists a few bytes and the response can be tens of thousands of times bigger, resulting in an amplification attack
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
//| where not (ipv4_is_match("10.0.0.0",SourceIP,8) or ipv4_is_match("172.16.0.0",SourceIP,12) or ipv4_is_match("192.168.0.0",SourceIP,16))
//and  (ipv4_is_match("10.0.0.0",DestinationIP,8) or ipv4_is_match("172.16.0.0",DestinationIP,12) or ipv4_is_match("192.168.0.0",DestinationIP,16))
|where Protocol contains "udp_ip"
|where DestinationPort==11211
|summarize Evntcount=count() by SourceIP,bin(TimeGenerated,10m)
|where Evntcount>=100
